betterquesting.name: Exploring the Bunker
betterquesting.desc:
Ninety years after the war, the members of The Project woke to a changed world. Scouts from Bunker 719 were sent out to assess the situation but returned with an infectious disease. The disease nearly wiped the whole team and the survivors decided to stay in the bunker rather than risk venturing out.

Your mother had no idea she was pregnant with you when she joined The Project. Born in Bunker 719, you have known nothing else. What you do know of the outside world are stories told to you by those who are left. Twenty years later, those who survived are aging and the Bunker is deteriorating.

betterquesting.name: A Campground Settlement
betterquesting.desc: When you walk in, there is a small group of people living in the camp. Time to see if they are friendly.

betterquesting.name: Medicine for Jen
betterquesting.desc: Jen is suffering from joint pain and headaches and told you others are as well. Interesting that more than one is suffering the same thing. Perhaps the water is contaminated?

betterquesting.name: A Strange Hunt
betterquesting.desc: Marc has invited you to go hunting with the men of Cozyton. Perhaps they can show you how to find the healthier animals in the wilderness.

tasks.description: Let Marc know you are ready.
Speak with Marc back at Cozyton.

betterquesting.name: Something Isn’t Right
betterquesting.desc: The hunt has left you scratching your head. Are they robbing others of their animals or something more sinister? You feel something isn’t right and decide to snoop around the cafeteria of the town.

betterquesting.name: Cozyton
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Searching for Clean Water
betterquesting.desc: While looking for clean water to drink, you find a river. The water, however is contaminated from the soil, so you decide to work your way upriver to see if the water is any cleaner. You come across a small dock town called Riverside.

betterquesting.name: Clean Water Factory
betterquesting.desc: Husky has asked that you mediate between the town and Lynne’s group in the factory up river.

betterquesting.name: Back to Riverside
betterquesting.desc: Unfortunately, Lynne and her group would not listen to reason. Now you need to tell HuskyMudkipz and the town of Riverside the bad news.

betterquesting.name: Asking for Help
betterquesting.desc: The commander wants you to find a few things. Maybe the others can help. You try and convince them to come with you, but they tell you they have lived their own lives in the bunker and wouldn’t survive in the new world.

betterquesting.name: Convincing the Commander
betterquesting.desc: Tiime to see if the commander makes good on his word.

betterquesting.name: New Quest
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Finding the town
betterquesting.desc: Your first time outside the bunker. The Wasteland is vast and mostly empty and void of life. Jeeves gave you some rudimentery directions to Pleasant Valley. Time to start across the river.....but then you remember Ol' Gearge telling you the water is probably dangerous. You venture east to see if there is a bridge still intact.

betterquesting.name: Arrival in Pleasant Valley
betterquesting.desc: You found Pleasant Valley easily enough. You see a guard stationed at the entrance to the town and decide to speak with him.

betterquesting.name: The Search for Power
betterquesting.desc:
It’s time to set out to find other survivors and see what the world has become since the war. Your main purpose is to find a power source and bring it back to the bunker for the elders.

Vault password is: VaultTech719

betterquesting.name: Stolen Items
betterquesting.desc: Items have mysteriously gone missing. The mayor asked that you talk with the citizens complaining. They live on the west side of town.

betterquesting.name: Abandoned Mine
betterquesting.desc: With your basic weapons from the bunker you likely can not take the bandits out, so the mayor has you talk to the locals to get more information and better weapons and armour before heading over to the mine.

tasks.description: Speak with Rodrick inside the mine.

betterquesting.name: Preparing to Leave
betterquesting.desc: Perhaps you should visit the other bunker dwellers before returning to the commander.

betterquesting.name: General Store
betterquesting.desc: The mayor gave you a battery to sell at the general store. Use the caps you receive to equip yourself at the other shops around town.

betterquesting.name: Finding a Legion
betterquesting.desc: Team member, Thomas Franklin, has told you about a group of paladins who might be convinced to help police the area and train survivors. He said they were somewhere to the northwest.

betterquesting.name: Iron Legion
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Refuse the Offer
betterquesting.desc: You refuse Rodrick's offer.

betterquesting.name: A Better Offer
betterquesting.desc: You propose a better offer.

betterquesting.name: Accept Offer
betterquesting.desc: You accept Rodrick's offer.

betterquesting.name: Choice #1
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Choice #2
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Choice #3
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Riverside
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Jen's Task
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Littleton
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Talking to the Locals
betterquesting.desc: You decide to rummage through the houses to see if there is anything you can find.

betterquesting.name: Wizard of Littleton
betterquesting.desc: Hdawg told you that the wizard lives in a metal cave north of town.

tasks.description: Talk to Fitz in the lab

betterquesting.name: Slavers of the North
betterquesting.desc: The people of Littleton said slavers come down in the winter, from the north, and kidnap people to sell.

betterquesting.name: Littleton Rumor
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Fresh Meat
betterquesting.desc: RW has a task for you.

betterquesting.name: New Shoes
betterquesting.desc: Eli has a task for you.

betterquesting.name: Large Pot
betterquesting.desc: Sue has a task for you.

betterquesting.name: Friendly Reunion
betterquesting.desc: Fitz mentioned something about a friend named Denis that left him years ago. There is a Denis in town - perhaps one and the same?

betterquesting.name: RW's Quest
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Eli's Quest
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Sue's Quest
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Denis
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Unlikely Allies
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Davis Project Location
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Mining Operation
betterquesting.desc: Thomas Franklin said a Davis Project team has a mining operation far to the northwest.

betterquesting.name: Davis Project Location
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Riverside
betterquesting.desc: Thomas Franklin said a Davis Project team is located at the settlement of Riverside west of Pleasant Valley.

betterquesting.name: Missing People
betterquesting.desc: Cohkha from the bar at Pleasant Valley said two men went north to make contact with a settlement called Cozyton. They haven't been heard from since.

betterquesting.name: Cozyton Rumor
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Junkyard
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Man's Best Friend
betterquesting.desc: When you enter the abandoned junkyard, you realize it is not abandoned. Scores of zombies and other mutated creatures swarm the yard. You hear a dog barking somewhere inside.

betterquesting.name: Raiders Rumor
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Razors
betterquesting.desc: Haliee at the diner in Pleasant Valley said a group of raiders sweep through the area every winter. They are holed up in some grocery store to the northeast.

betterquesting.name: Project Davis Location
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Rogue Team
betterquesting.desc: Thomas Franklin said the project's M.A.R.S. team for the region went rogue and has been holed up in Colorado Springs to the east.

betterquesting.name: Miner's Den
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Lost Miners
betterquesting.desc: As you enter the town you notice the people are afraid of something. No one wants to go near the mining entrance.

betterquesting.name: A Lost Friend
betterquesting.desc: You see one of the miners waving you over.

betterquesting.name: Smitty
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Return with News
betterquesting.desc: What you found in the mine was nothing short of horrific.

betterquesting.name: Sorely Under Defended
betterquesting.desc: Skiddles would like to speak to you about securing the mine.

betterquesting.name: Lost Dog
betterquesting.desc: If you lose your dog or he/she dies, you can get a new one back at the junkyard. This can only be done once every Minecraft day.

betterquesting.name: Norad Rumors
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: NORAD
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Searching for Power
betterquesting.desc: Jack Hansen said there may be a power cell north of where he was walking. He also said ghouls live there and are hostile toward humans.

betterquesting.name: The Old Ski Lodge
betterquesting.desc: You work your way up the mountain to their main gate where you are stopped by their guards.

betterquesting.name: Exterminator
betterquesting.desc: The guards said Elder Snoop wants to speak with you in his command room.

betterquesting.name: Cleaning Up the Neighborhood
betterquesting.desc: Elder Snoop has another task for you.

betterquesting.name: Razorclaw Valley
betterquesting.desc: Elder Snoop has another task for you.

betterquesting.name: Looking for Brass
betterquesting.desc: Paladin Jefferson is looking for help.

betterquesting.name: Lost His Focus
betterquesting.desc: Sentinel Washington has been looking for you.

betterquesting.name: A Change of Heart
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: New Quest
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Premire Hoarder
betterquesting.desc: Wow, you really collected them all?

betterquesting.name: Unintentional Thievery
betterquesting.desc: There is a boy sitting by the entrance to the Iron Legion HQ. Perhaps you should see what is wrong.

betterquesting.name: The Witnesses
betterquesting.desc: You heard two people in Riverside may have witnessed Lynne's group tampering with the fresh water.

betterquesting.name: Riverside Rumor
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Emdees
betterquesting.desc: Percy said there is a place east of Riverside where the Emdees, medics, travel from. He said it was near Tower City, perhaps that is the old Colorado Springs?

betterquesting.name: Rumors of Mutants
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: What Are Super Mutants?
betterquesting.desc: The residents of Cozyton told me Super Mutants live in an abandoned building east of here. What are Super Mutants?!

betterquesting.name: Black Forest Observatory
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: First Encounter
betterquesting.desc: As you make your way to the observatory you see a long, winding road heading up the mountain. At the top of the hill are two enormous mutants. You decide to see if holding your hands up as a sign of peace and walking slowly toward them will work.

betterquesting.name: That Hurt!
betterquesting.desc: You don't remember anything after speaking with the mutant guards. Just the lights went out.....

betterquesting.name: Much Needed Parts
betterquesting.desc: Dartron looks particulary excited.

betterquesting.name: Dam Power!
betterquesting.desc: Dartron looks frustrated.

betterquesting.name: Exploring the Power Plant
betterquesting.desc: You have come across a large dam that used to supply power to the surrounding area. The first level looks like storage.

betterquesting.name: Skaguay Dam
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Finding the Mainframe
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Second Floor
betterquesting.desc: The second floor of the dam looks like living quarters.

betterquesting.name: Third Floor
betterquesting.desc: The third floor looks like where the power went out of the dam to the cities.

betterquesting.name: Fifth Floor
betterquesting.desc: The fifth floor houses all the transformers.

betterquesting.name: Seventh Floor
betterquesting.desc: The seventh floor is where the water comes in to turn the turbines.

betterquesting.name: Ninth Floor
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Tenth Floor
betterquesting.desc: This floor has refineries and large reservoirs of water.

betterquesting.name: Eleventh Floor
betterquesting.desc: This floor has two control rooms looking over the last two floors.

betterquesting.name: Twelfth Floor
betterquesting.desc: More transformers but this floor has a mainframe computer to control the whole power plant you gather.

betterquesting.name: Thirteenth Floor
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Mesa Verde
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Get Out the Raid!
betterquesting.desc: As you approach the building, you see it is occupied by Raiders. You will need to get rid of them if you wish to use the equipment inside.

betterquesting.name: This Place is Still Occupied
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Restoring Power
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Restoring Communication
betterquesting.desc: Trevor told you the Razors sabatoged the antenna towers and they will need to be fixed before you can use the radio equipment.

betterquesting.name: Radio Station
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Contacting Command
betterquesting.desc: Now that the antenna towers have been repaired it is time to see if you can contact Alpha Base.

betterquesting.name: Contacting Regional Base
betterquesting.desc: You were unable to contact Alpha Base, perhaps you should try and connect with the regional base.

tasks.description: Use the radio at the station

betterquesting.name: A Raider Problem
betterquesting.desc: While travelling the long trail to the Iron Legion, you spot the ancient Pueblo ruins of Mesa Verde. You read about this place during your studies growing up in the bunker. As you look more closely, you see signs of habitation and decide to see if they are friend or foe.

betterquesting.name: A Solution?
betterquesting.desc: Abakus sent you to help Geo out with her Railgun contraption.

betterquesting.name: Using a Gun
betterquesting.desc:
You have aquired your first gun. First, take the bullets out of the box by right-clicking the box until it disappears. Press R to load the gun and right-click to aim and left-click to shoot.

§4§cWARNING: There is a glitch with the mod when you reload before the ammo is depleted. It erases the ammo already loaded in the gun and then reloads essentially wasting your bullets.

betterquesting.name: Aquire a Gun
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Aquire Backpack
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Fanny Pack
betterquesting.desc:
You have aquired a fanny pack. There isn't much room but it is something. To equip the pack, open your inventory and place it in the top right corner where the backpack icon is. Now three more slots are available to you for storage.

The backpack will drop upon death or be on your corpse.

betterquesting.name: Bunker 719
betterquesting.desc: In 2077, a nuclear war broke out world wide and most US citizens were taken by surprise. Years before the war, a visionist began a project to train specialized groups to rebuild civilization in the event of war. Through the use of cryogenics, the teams were stored away in bunkers in key places around the country, waiting out the worst of the fallout.

betterquesting.name: Pleasant Valley
betterquesting.desc: Pleasant Valley, a quaint, little all-American town. As you look around, you wonder if they have what you are looking for.

betterquesting.name: Cozyton
betterquesting.desc: You come across a small campground. You notice the glow of a fire. The camp has no protective walls or defenses that you can see.

betterquesting.name: Iron Legion
betterquesting.desc: Throughout your travels you have heard many stories of the mighty Iron Legion. You have decided to find their base and see if you can join their ranks or at least form an alliance. You feel with the armour and firepower they control it would give you a much better advantage in surviving the wasteland.

betterquesting.name: Riverside
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Littleton
betterquesting.desc: You come across what’s left of a small town convinced that it is abandoned. As you look around the town, there are no signs of life at all, human or animal.

betterquesting.name: Miner's Den
betterquesting.desc: You come across a shanty town built next to a mining cave in a mountain. It looks like one of those wild west gold rush towns you read about in books.

betterquesting.name: Chenne Reservation
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Observatory
betterquesting.desc: Super Mutants are a race of beings that descended from humans. After the war some humans experienced a massive DNA change from the radiation, giving them gigantic, natural strength, but very low IQ’s. After their mutations, they went into the mountains into hiding, to avoid being hunted by other humans.

betterquesting.name: Norad
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Colorado Springs
betterquesting.desc: Even the air carried with it an impure evil during the days of darkness. There were those scientists who remained in their bunkers with their families until the evil had done its work and left the land, then they returned to the surface aiming to rebuild an utopian society.

betterquesting.name: The Wastes
betterquesting.desc: Southern Colorado has become a desolate wasteland after the war. Few buildings remain standing.

betterquesting.name: Bobblehead Collector
betterquesting.desc: They're not dolls, they're action figures!

betterquesting.name: Magazine Collector
betterquesting.desc: Who said print was dead?

betterquesting.name: Mesa Verde
betterquesting.desc: Hidden away in the shadows of a large cliff near the top of a mesa is the village of Mesa Verde. The tribe there is unusual becasue they're skilled in mathematics and electronics. In the weeks following the war, a group of scientists and soldiers based at the atomic lab at Los Alamos, New Mexico, wandered north and settled here.

betterquesting.name: Skaguay Dam
betterquesting.desc: "The miracle of the Skaguay Power Plant," wrote Winfred Ward Clark in a short history of the project, "is that it was built in the first place."

betterquesting.name: Tutorials
betterquesting.desc: This is a description of certain items you may come across in the Wastes.
